snippet: The leak at a frozen storage and logistics business that sent stinging fumes into nearby residential areas also injured at least 25 people, some seriously.
abstract: Ammonia leak at Shanghai frozen storage and logistics business kills at least 15 people and injures 25; China's government has said it is trying to reduce workplace deaths and that number of such deaths has fallen.
lead_paragraph: The leak at a frozen storage and logistics business that sent stinging fumes into nearby residential areas also injured at least 25 people, some seriously.

headline.print_headline: At Least 15 Die in Shanghai After Ammonia Leak
